attributes.action: adopt the following policies to reduce UK CO2 emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
* Climate change is caused by industrial pollution

* It is imminent and a threat to everyone's survival and welfare

* The UK gov. should set an example for the rest

* Investment in cleaner technologies will benefit the economy

* Lifestyle changes must be incremental, predictable and rapid


1 New fossil-fuel power stations after 2010 must have CCS. Old ones to be fitted with CCS by 2015, or close by 2020.

2 New cars may only be licensed after 2010 if they have <130g/km CO2 emissions.

3 Promote smaller, localised schools, hospitals and industries and work-from-home schemes to reduce travel.

4 Provide 50% grants for all renewable energy generation installations in domestic, commercial and civic buildings.

5 Introduce a Carbon tax at 20p per tonne carbon in 2010 on top of all existing taxes. This rate to increase geometrically by 50%/year for 20 years, by law.
